publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3862 Anne McLaughlin: Clear Vision on Job Creation—That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement by Optical Express of its intention to create 300 new jobs in Scotland; recognises that around 200 of these new posts will be located in Glasgow at the firm’s call centre, which opened last year, and congratulates the firm for bucking the current economic trend and investing in further employment.

S3M-3862 Anne McLaughlin: Clear Vision on Job Creation—That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement by Optical Express of its intention to create 300 new jobs in Scotland; recognises that around 200 of these new posts will be located in Glasgow at the firm’s call centre, which opened last year, and congratulates the firm for bucking the current economic trend and investing in further employment.
S3M-3862 Clear Vision on Job Creation (lodged on 2 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3862 Clear Vision on Job Creation (lodged on 2 April 2009) Michael Matheson*
